content: basic bulky manly man hat materials us 10 - 6 0 mm circular and double point needles 144 yards bulky yarn chunky works too cast on 72 with circular needles or double points k2 p2 rib four inches knit in the round until the hat measures 10 inches evenly place four markers every 18 stitches decrease round from 1st marker k2 decrease ~knit until 2 stitches before next marker ssk move marker k2 decrease repeat from ~ until 2 st before 1st marker ssk 1st decrease round complete k one round repeat decrease round followed by k round until there are 8 stitches left omit the last k round break yarn leaving a long tail to pull through the 8 stitches and weave in all ends i made this pattern up as i went and gifted it before i thought to check the gauge but it fits a big noggin 23-24 easily decrease cast on by multiples of 8 for smaller sizes enjoy
